title: Soccer, Eddie Izzard, Jeff Dunham and a BBQ
excerpt: Well, the past 3 days have been quite busy actually. On Thursday, I had my 2 classes, then I went to watch soccer at the public viewing area again. We watched Germany lose against Croatia. This time I went with Dieuwertje, Katie (another American exchange student), Manuel (a German guy), Andrew and Hester. It was … more →
